name: Taiko Tag
description: Taiko Tag is a 1v1 local multiplayer game where each player plays as a Taiko drummer engaged in an intense drumming competition. Players will go back and forth playing 4 beats of rhythm by hitting the center and the rim of their drum to a simple background theme. Once the first player performs their set, the opposing player will be required to repeat it back to them, then perform another 4-beat set for the first player to repeat in turn. This will continue back and forth until the game reaches a set tempo, ending the game and showing players their note accuracy and who outperformed the other.
